casebody.data:
Jacqueline J. Anderson v. Robert F. Ludgin et al. David T. Ryan and Lawrence A. Cox, for the appellee (named defendant). Sharon S. Tisher, for the appellant (plaintiff). Sharon S. Tisher and Allan B. Taylor, in support of the motion. Argued January 3 decided January 3, 1978 Submitted December 6, 1977

decided January 3, 1978

The named defendant’s motion to dismiss the appeal from the Superior Court in Hartford County is denied by the court.

It appearing that no finding or assignment of errors has yet been filed, the plaintiff’s “Motion For Expedited Appeal” is denied by the court as premature.
